betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The first Precious Metals, mainly Gold can only be obtained through this processing chain. At least until UEV.

To start this processing chain simply place some Aqua Regia into a chemical reactor with Precious Metal Dust.
This Will result in Precious Metal Solution.

Unfortunately Precious Metal Solution is still quite acid so you can't use Fluid Cells to carry it. 
ยง6You can still use buckets though.
